title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2323/88 of 26 July 1988 amending Regulation (EEC) No 79/88 as regards quality standards for lettuces, curled-leaved endives and broad- leaved (Batavian) endives
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2323/88 of 26 July 1988 amending Regulation (EEC) No 79/88 as regards quality standards for lettuces, curled-leaved endives and broad-leaved (Batavian) endives
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The second paragrah of Section IV. C of Annex I to Regulation (EEC) No 79/88 is hereby deleted.
This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 July 1988.
For the Commission Franz ANDRIESSEN Vice-President (4) OJ No L 118, 20. 5. 1972, p. 1.
(5) OJ No L 198, 26. 7. 1988, p. 7.
(6) OJ No L 10, 14. 1. 1988, p. 8.
